definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
grandpa (polite form of address for old man)

sentences.english: Uncle and aunt launched a laundry with the blunt hunter.
sentences.chinese: 伯伯和伯母与直率的猎人创办了一家洗衣店。

sentences.english: Yingzi dreams about Uncle An becoming her step-father.
sentences.chinese: 樱子非常希望安伯伯成为她的继父。

sentences.english: I saw Wang Wei carry water for Uncle Li yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我看见王伟为李伯伯挑水。

sentences.english: The students walked through the gates with Uncle Wang (L34).
sentences.chinese: 同学们紧跟王伯伯走进厂门。

sentences.english: Guidry said that he challenged Wang to go outside of his comfort zone last night.
sentences.chinese: 古伯伯说昨晚是他要小王走出他那感到安全的地带。

sentences.english: You 'd better ask that old man himself.
sentences.chinese: 你最好问问那老伯伯本人。

sentences.english: One day, a flock of sheep farmers uncle arrived to our home.
sentences.chinese: 一天，一位农民伯伯将一群羊赶到了我们的家园。

sentences.english: Crops to ripen because farmer uncle gave them love.
sentences.chinese: 庄稼成熟是因为农民伯伯给了它们爱。

sentences.english: Uncle Chen, nice to see you.
Mountain terraces, moved, farmers uncle opened smiling face.
sentences.chinese: 山间的梯田里，麦浪滚滚，农民伯伯绽开了笑脸。

sentences.english: I read that Ron Guidry wants to help out in Spring Training, " he said."
sentences.chinese: 我看到一则新闻说，古伯伯明年春训想要回来帮忙。

sentences.english: In the last two years, many students in China have asked me why Uncle Chen did not go visit them.
sentences.chinese: 两年来学生们常问我为什么陈伯伯没有来？

sentences.english: The farmer uncle in hope of field, with harvest own work achievement.
sentences.chinese: 农民伯伯在希望的田野上，收获着自己的劳动成果。

sentences.english: uncle and aunt launched a laundry with the blunt hunter.
sentences.chinese: 伯伯和伯母与坦直的猎人开办了一家洗衣店。

sentences.english: A year ago, the man chose to spend even a group of paintings to me.
sentences.chinese: 一年前，伯伯选了一幅连花群的画给我。

definition: father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
